resources.string: Please turn on the Bluetooth adapter.
Please allow location permission to use sensor(s).
Instruct the patient to rest the forearms on the chair armrest as shown in the image, and once the patient is in the correct position, press the Start button to proceed with the data recording.
Instruct the patient to keep both arms fully extended as shown in the image and, once the patient is in the correct position, press the Start button to proceed with the data recording.
The data registration has been canceled. Select a new position to be registered.
The data has been saved successfully. Select the remaining position to complete the recording process.
Both positions have been successfully recorded and saved. Press the Upload button to proceed with the analysis and classification of the data. To repeat the recording process, press the Reset button.
Wait while the data is being analyzed.
If you consider that the data has been appropriately recorded, press the Confirm button to save the recorded data. Otherwise, press the Restart button to repeat the recording.
Data recording will begin shortly. \n %.00f sec
Wait while the data is being recorded. \n %.00f sec
The recorded tremor has been classified as physiological tremor.
A pathological tremor has been identified. It has been classified as Essential tremor.
A pathological tremor has been identified. It has been classified as Parkinson\'s disease.
Please wait until the sensor is ready to start recording.
In order to start the test, please select the first position to record.
Please wait while the data is being exported from Xsens Dot.
The data has been sent and saved successfully. Press the New button to record a new patient. To repeat the recording process with the current patient, press the Reset button.
